alert.note: Alert for Dundy; Hitchcock; Red Willow (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 27 at 3:04PM CDT until October 29 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM MDT /10 AM CDT/ SATURDAY TO NOON MDT /1 PM CDT/ SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. Highest snow totals across Yuma and Dundy counties. Some light freezing rain is possible, mainly in Kansas. * WHERE...Portions of east central and northeast Colorado, northwest Kansas and southwest Nebraska. * WHEN...From 9 AM MDT /10 AM CDT/ Saturday to noon MDT /1 PM CDT/ Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions, especially on elevated surfaces.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
